title: Riyas Delicious Corner
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Indian, Western, Buffet, Indo-Chinese
description: North and South Indian food, Chinese food, and pizza. Vegans need to specify. On Sunday, a Gujarati Thali buffet is offered and features pooran puri, undhiyu, dal, kadhi, mutter rice, pickles, salad, papadum, shrikhand, kapuri paan, and other dishes. Free parking available.
streetAddress: Shivachi Road, MP Shah Hospital, Doctor's Plaza, Parklands
